title: E3 2020 Revamp Details - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.17.19
description:
S.J. Mueller from DC Universe Online joins Greg to talk about the new pitch for E3, Apple Arcade's crazy amount of games, and making an MMO in 2019.

Timestamps - 
00:04:29 - Housekeeping
There’s a new Oreo Oration today: The Most Stuf!
The Roper Report   -
00:05:16 - E3 2020 proposes overhaul
00:13:25 - Apple Arcade is looking good
00:21:13 - “Do you believe that 100 number will be mostly shovelware?” - Frankfurtter
00:23:56 - GameStop Test Store Surfaces Online
00:27:16 - “Do you think this new welcoming gamer space will be enough to attract customers?” - The Nano Biologist
00:31:36 - Final Fantasy 14: Shadowbringingers’ Nier Automata Alliance Raid
00:36:00 - “I want to know what you think of other MMOs on the market?” - The Nano Biologist
00:38:07 - Knights and Bikes Getting a TV Series
00:39:52 - Out today
00:43:26 -  kindafunny.com/paxtournament
Reader mail   -
00:43:40 - “Yesterday, you discussed the recent sentencing for the Ohio SWATting incident…” - Chris RVA
00:47:38 - “Is Link’s Awakening (Switch) a normal embargo?” - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:51:16 - “Where do we put some of these gems of the past in an already packed holiday season?” - Frankfurtter
00:54:13 - Squad Up: Arvel Crynyd - Twitter - @arvel_crynyd
00:55:34 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Imran & Whitta
